website_summaries.verdict: A Hayward replacement cartridge for the CC1000 series that fits several pool filters.
pros: This cartridge is constructed with reinforced polyester and features 100 square feet of filtering material
It delivers a high level of filtration and, if taken care of, may go longer than other brands before needing replacement
cons: Some of the cartridges arrive with a small bit of extra plastic which may keep them from fitting into your filter

customer_reviews.title: Get the right replacement for best results.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing works better than OEM replacement parts. When I bought my Hayward filter unit I ordered an extra cartridge. Well, the people sent me a PleatCo cartridge as the second one. The PleatCo is not a replacement for a Hayward. I never did work right. I contacted the people at Hayward and they told me that the PleatCo would not work, and they were right. I installed the Hayward cartridge and had good results right away. Note; this is intended to be a lifetime filter. The Hayward web site says to wash it with dish detergent as body oils and suntan lotions will clog it.
customer_reviews.author: Lewis W. Parrish

customer_reviews.title: Not a genuine Hayward
customer_reviews.text: I bought the exact size to replace my original Hayward, checked the model number and everything and this one did not fit. It looks the same but does not fit the filter. The original did not take any force - it just pops in, this one did not. It has to be a counterfeit which I'm finding is the norm here on Amazon. Had so many problems with our filter this summer. I'm chalking it up to a bad decision on my part but wanted to warn others. I will go to my pool store next season to get a REAL Hayward cartridge - it will cost me more but at least I know it will work.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela C.

customer_reviews.title: Price Gouging
customer_reviews.text: Price Gouging Purchased May 1, 2020 for $64 each. Now June 18, the price is $102. That’s a 59% increase in 49 days. And like many other reviewers have stated, these filters do not fit correctly. These were EXTREMELY difficult to seat and they vibrated so badly that we had to put duct tape around the top of the filter housing. I purchased the filters from the seller in 2018 and those filters were off brand, but fit fine. This will be my last purchase from this opportunistic seller.
customer_reviews.author: D. Graham

customer_reviews.title: Great filter
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this filter. Was skeptical at first because all I've used for 6 years was the same more expensive "name brand" filter so making a switch to a less expensive "no name" filter made me nervous but WOW this filter is great. Had no issue with the fit, keeps the water clean like filters are supposed too, easy to clean and the price is amazing. Definitely switching over to this one for now on...why pay more for something that basically does nothing but traps dead bugs, my daughter's and her friends never ending hair and everything else nasty. It cleans it all and does the job at a better price.
customer_reviews.author: Greg P.

customer_reviews.title: Exact replacement
customer_reviews.text: Exact factory Hayward brand replacement. I replace mine every year because the chlorine tends to eat the glue holding the straps onto the filter pleats and it just gets to where if I have a big algae outbreak like I did this spring, the old filter will not get the fine particles out but when I change to a new filter, its clear in two days. The new filter really makes a difference. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Manufactured slightly wrong
customer_reviews.text: This happens every 3rd year or so it seems, where they filter cartridge holes on the ends are manufactured a few millimeters too small and you can never quite screw the filter top on right for the whole summer. Some years I contemplate getting a file and just filing the plastic just enough so it fits, but then I worry it won't make a good seal, so I don't. Looks like this will be another year where the filter top will never be screwed all the way into locking place. My neighbor and I co-commiserate as he's had the same problem.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Not the same as the picture
customer_reviews.text: What I received was not the same as in the picture. It didn’t fit even though the numbers and everything else matched. The one I received also had a white top and bottom not blue so I’m not sure if that made the difference or not.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: All last year I thought about purchasing a 2nd filter so I had less downtime when thoroughly cleaning my pool filter. I tend to change these on the weekend, during the day, and when I would really like to have the pump running to push the water through the solar heater panels. Now, I can swap them out in a few minutes and properly soak and clean the dirty filter.
customer_reviews.author: C. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Name brand wins
customer_reviews.text: I bought the cheaper off brand filter. Replaced it with Hayward. The difference in movement is Amaxibg. I never heard the water or saw the flow besides a ripple. Now it’s obvious. Worth the extra few bucks. It must have better flow
customer_reviews.author: Susan K.

customer_reviews.title: It works. Just a slight manufacturing flaw
customer_reviews.text: Does not fit filter canister mounts well. I always have to use a round file to chamfer the filter plastic ends where the holes are that slide into the canister post. If I don’t the filter will “crush” Other than that manufacturing problem, the filter works well. After getting pool chemistry right, I can get through the season on a single filter.
customer_reviews.author: Roxx Wallington

customer_reviews.title: High quality and FAST delivery
customer_reviews.text: The 2 most important things - the product had the needed high quality, and it was delivered WHEN I needed it. This filter has a better internal structure than the original factory one. I know I will be buying more of the filters, and I know now from whom I plan to buy them.
customer_reviews.author: Dave T

customer_reviews.title: Beware
customer_reviews.text: Not sure this is a true OEM Hayward filter. I bought this last year and it seems to need cleaning more than the Hayward filter that came with my system. I verified I order correct part number. I will by locally at dealer from now on or look for alternatives
customer_reviews.author: A. Santoro

customer_reviews.title: NOT a replacement for CCX1000RE!
customer_reviews.text: This absolutely does not fit as a replacement for the CCX1000RE. The inside diameter is 1/8” too small and made of rigid plastic (not flexible rubber). I see other reviews say the same thing, yet somehow the description continues to say it will fit.
customer_reviews.author: A. Trank

customer_reviews.title: Buy original hayward
customer_reviews.text: I have an cream hayward filter. I tried the pleacko filter. It made my system vibrate to where I though it would break. You must buy an original hayward cartridge filter. Was tighter than the original but no probs with it
customer_reviews.author: Rosemarei

customer_reviews.title: Difference between CC1000E and CCX1000RE.
customer_reviews.text: In June 2017 I ordered 2 what I thought were CC1000E replacement cartridges. The CC1000E worked beautiful and I have no complaints. But the second was a CCX1000RE which DOES NOT fit into the filter. The base hole is 4 inches and the CCX is only three. We just opened this cartridge this year. The original cartridge works fantastic, but the other did not for into the filter.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl B.

customer_reviews.title: Terrific Value
customer_reviews.text: Having had a sand filter for more than a decade I much prefer a cartridge filter system. This Hayward is worth every penny. My pool is crystal clear and this filter is a big part of that.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony E

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t fit the same as the original filter
customer_reviews.text: This supposedly is the replacement for my pool filter. The model numbers are the same. Only trouble is-it doesn’t fit! The hole which Bhat to be mounted into the bottom of my filter is too small. Purchased it Pre-season and just tried to use it. Too late for a return. A waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn S.

customer_reviews.title: Did not fit, so we shaved it down a bit
customer_reviews.text: This is the third filter I have purchased from this vendor, and the first time I absolutely could not get the filter to fit. The last time it took a bit of work, but this time it simply wouldn't fit. Since we needed it badly, we shaved down the inside of the filter so it would fit properly.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Pricing was excellent and it worked well. I had to sand a little bit off the center to fit my filter but it was no big deal. I had the same issue with another cartridge from another vendor so I believe that it is what it is when Hayward came out with a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy K.

customer_reviews.title: Fit but needed to be trimmed.
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased for my Hayward CC10092STL pool filter. It did not fit on the lower part of my pool filter. I had to use a razor blade to trim and slightly widen one of the ends. After shaving the inner lip of the cartridge it fit right on. I'm not sure if this is normal since it fits various models but it certainly is not ideal.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Marquez

customer_reviews.title: Good prices
customer_reviews.text: Saved a bunch of money versus the price from our local pool supply shop. Our pool runs year round so we go through equipment and filters much quicker than most folks. This product is very well put together and easy to install. We are very happy with our choice.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great fix; great price
customer_reviews.text: Pool pump filter housing started making a loud vibration type of noise. It was because the inside of the filter was not making contact with the inner cone on the lid. The fix was a new filter. The local pool store wanted twice as much money for the same filter. I got it through Amazon Prime, installed it the next day and the noise was resolved.
customer_reviews.author: Rambo

customer_reviews.title: Better from pool place
customer_reviews.text: This same filter from the pool place worked much better. Not sure why, but the quality couldn't be the same.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Damrow

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product works with my pool. I order this every year (my mother likes to have new filters every year).
customer_reviews.author: Tia K.H.Jones

customer_reviews.title: Get this and not the off brand
customer_reviews.text: Worth the money to get a name brand one!! Once I took my old off brand filter out and put this one it, my water pressure was back to normal going back into the pool. I'll never buy an off brand one again!
customer_reviews.author: Jen Semelka

customer_reviews.title: will buy again
customer_reviews.text: I gave this product 5 stars because of the price was a half of local price. Quality was decent similar to the local store product but it could not still compare to original one that made in USA product. My original one did last for 5 years.
customer_reviews.author: DQ

customer_reviews.title: Not good - 3 months and replaced already
customer_reviews.text: Straps started breaking and wasn’t cleaning. It just basically became a dirt holder.
customer_reviews.author: S. Whitelock

customer_reviews.title: did not fit
customer_reviews.text: the color of the top and bottom is white instead of blue. The product did not fit in the filter housing.They would not let me return it because I waited over 30 days. I had to modify the opening (file it down to fit).
customer_reviews.author: somebody else

customer_reviews.title: Works and fits as designed
customer_reviews.text: No worries or any questions. Being the original manufacturer I knew all would be fine. Best price, $50.00 below my local pool store.

customer_reviews.title: a must buy
customer_reviews.text: this product works great and its a lot cheaper on amazon then at your local pool store.

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit as described.
customer_reviews.text: The model no. is correct and according to the description, should be compatible with my filter, however it didn't fit because the end cap holes are too small. The end caps are white and not blue and the interior of the cartridge is not ribbed as in the OEM.
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Excellent filter
customer_reviews.text: Great replacement filter. Well made and works better than off brands that we've tried.
customer_reviews.author: Redrider1000

customer_reviews.title: Good replacement cartridge!
customer_reviews.text: No issues with this...it fits our Hayward filter just right and all is well! Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Scott W. Lacey

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: I have been getting a lot of sediment on the bottom of my pool and purchased a new filter made by a different manufacturer that was a little cheaper than the Hayward filter. That did not help the problem I was having. The Hayward filter cured an ongoing problem and I will only use these in the future. Definitely worth the extra 20 bucks, as it does the job it is supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: T.Z.

customer_reviews.title: Same as a pool store
customer_reviews.text: Costs less then at the pool store and exactly the same
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Exact replacement
customer_reviews.text: Good construction exact replacement for my Hayward filter, has held up well.
customer_reviews.author: Alice P.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect filter and better design than my previous filter cartridge.
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure if hayward improved the material used in these cartridge filters, but this filter seems to stay clean longer and is white again after a simple hose off. Very happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew S.

customer_reviews.title: Needs trimming but ok
customer_reviews.text: There was some excess plastic on the top of the inner core preventing the filter from fitting but nothing that a file or hack-saw could not handle with very little trimming or small slices. Works and fits fine afterward and just FYI so you don't return immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Viola the cat

customer_reviews.title: Cheap product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a spare and I just put it in and when I went to clean it found it broken. Very cheap
customer_reviews.author: diane de la cuadra

customer_reviews.title: the replacement cartridge did not fit, and I will ...
customer_reviews.text: the replacement cartridge did not fit, and I will have to pay a restocking fee for your mistake,the product you sell is defective.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GOOD PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: SLIGHTLY OFF SIZE OF THE HOLE. BUT NOTHING A METAL FILE COULD NOT FIX.
customer_reviews.author: Garry Zodda

customer_reviews.title: Hayward filters
customer_reviews.text: they work good easy to change. takes a little to get them clean but I usually only go through 2 a summer.as long as I clean them good
customer_reviews.author: nemahelk

customer_reviews.title: Cracked multi times within a month!!
customer_reviews.text: Just purchased this June 1st and the bottom of it has cracked in three places!!! It was fine the time I rinsed it out and just took it out to rinse again and the bottom is falling apart!
customer_reviews.author: sally thiel

customer_reviews.title: Hayward pool filter good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Looks like a sturdy filter for the money. We put it to use right away. Some we have had over the years only had 3 retaining bands This one had 4 and just felt solid. Should last a long time before deteriorating
customer_reviews.author: interested person

customer_reviews.title: Great construction (better than the original Hayward filter that came with pool)
customer_reviews.text: Only been using it for a month or so. But seems to be good construction. Filters water very well. Hopefully lasts as long as the original one that came with the pool (over 12 years). Take care of it like the manufacturer suggests, and it will take care of you.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Gagel

customer_reviews.title: Quick and accurate
customer_reviews.text: It's just a filter for my pool but it arrived quickly and was the exact filter I needed. Not much to say.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Strange

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best Replacement filter I have purchase as of yet! Will definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: gerridena

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Have bought cartridges from a large pool supplier ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Have bought cartridges from a large pool supplier and they never were very good. This is amazing. Clean pool again! So very happy. It is made so well. Bigger openings for cleaning and made with almost, a cloth material.

customer_reviews.title: Purchase the genuine item.
customer_reviews.text: Filter high quality. Recommend getting the genuine Hayward item and not purchasing a cheaper imitation.

customer_reviews.title: Price was FAR better than ordering it at any local pool store
customer_reviews.text: Price was FAR better than ordering it at any local pool store. I'm not a huge cartridge filter person but as long as you keep it clean, it works great

customer_reviews.title: Same product as in the store and fits better
customer_reviews.text: Same product as in stores but cheaper and fit better ! Would definitely buy again !

customer_reviews.text: USE IT LAST SEASON WITH NO PROBLEMS WHAT SO EVER

customer_reviews.title: Only buy Haywood original!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfect! Buy original Haywood filters only! I went generic and the filter did not quite fit and bounced around and made horrible noises when running.

customer_reviews.title: Very well built with excellent filtration
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. It had an immediate affect on my pool. I was so impressed I went back and ordered another one.

customer_reviews.title: Great filters
customer_reviews.text: This filter works great in our pool. They rinse easily and are pretty durable.

customer_reviews.text: Filter fit and functioned exactly as needed in a Hayward XStream filter system! Priced less than 3rd party replacements in local shops!

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!!

customer_reviews.title: garbage will fall apart on you.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: The description made it seem like it would work with my unit

customer_reviews.title: It fits easily to replace old filter
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. Fits easily to replace our old filter at a fair price.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent replacement for my old one and $25.00 than the pool store..

customer_reviews.title: OEM Long lasting Filter
customer_reviews.text: Our original filter lasted 9 seasons, so it made sense to only purchase another OEM filter.

customer_reviews.title: Not the same filter as pictured. I’ve used it ...
customer_reviews.text: Not the same filter as pictured. I’ve used it a week and it has a crack in it and it is flimsy compared to the filter I purchased last year with my new pump. I’m going to contact amazon.

customer_reviews.title: Replaceable, but Useful Pool Water Filter
customer_reviews.text: This filter has lasted a long time so far, it is a good investment for a pump driven pool some place that is dependable on this. The water output is pure when the pool has this unit to filter for it.

customer_reviews.title: Real thing. Good price.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect quality. Made the pool filter run strong as ever. Thank you!

customer_reviews.title: OEM Replacement Pool Filter Cartridge
customer_reviews.text: OEM replacement pool filter cartridge is exact replacement for original. Was purchased for this coming Spring 2015 pool opening. Expect perfect filtering when put to use. Paid a decent price (Fall prices are usually reduced) and delivery was Prime & on time.
customer_reviews.author: GrD_28

customer_reviews.title: Cartridge fell apart. All bands broke and both top and bottom plastic collars split!
customer_reviews.text: Cartridge fell apart. All bands broke and both top and bottom plastic collars split! Pretty expensive not to last more than 1 week. Second one I ordered did the same thing, are these defective?

As such, the filter requires far more frequent cleaning to maintain reasonable water flow. Perhaps they have changed the filter material.

product_meta.title: Hayward CCX1000RE (CC 1000E)Replacement Pool Filter Cartridge Elements, 100-Square-Foot
product_meta.description:
Size:100-Square-FootThis cartridge element is designed to use with Hayward XStream and the Hayward SwimPro Voyager filtration series full-flow cartridge elements 100 square foot, and fits only models CC10092S, CC100922S, CC10092SFT, CC10092STL, CC10093STUFFT. Also fits Hayward Star-Clear and HCF series cartridge filter models C225, C250, C500. 100-square feet. Measures 9-Inch OD by 17 5/8-Inch Height. Weighs 7.0 lbs.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Hayward cartridge elements 100-square feet for CC1000 Series
feature_bullets: This maintain your pool water cleanliness and clarity.
Hayward elements provide a high degree of water clarity and longer filter cycles
Hayward reusable cartridge filter elements are made of a superior reinforced polyester material
Hayward cartridge elements 100-square feet for CC1000 Series. Fits models CC10092S, CC100922S, CC10092SFT, CC10092STL and CC10093STUFFT only

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars484 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
